field_metadata.description: The page title is displayed on search engine results pages (SERPs) as the clickable headline for a given result, and are important for usability, SEO, and social sharing.

Enter a heading for the accordion
The panel will be given an ID based on the name field
Select this if the CTA needs to open in a new tab
This is the title that shows up on the browser tab/window. Fill this if it is different from the page title.
Page description is what shows up in search results. Having an accurate description can improve page ranking

field_metadata.description: Keywords are ideas and topics that define what your content is about. In terms of SEO, they're the words and phrases that users enter into search engines to find content.

field_metadata.instruction: Fill this in if different from the page title.
Fill this in if different from the page description.
field_metadata.description: This is where you describe your content, but instead of it showing on a search engine results page, it shows below the link title on Facebook. You are not limited to a character count, but its best to use around 200 letters.

field_metadata.instruction: This appears as a thumbnail when the page is shared across social media sites
field_metadata.description: A picture always helps content stand out. This is how you ensure that a particular thumbnail will be shown when your page is shared. It can be very helpful for your conversion rates.

field_metadata.instruction: These fields are used extensively by social media when the webpage is shared as a link
Page classification for help hub / analytics etc
This will be added just above </body>
This will be added be added to <style> in the <head>

custom_script.css: .s__action-bar .actions__list::after,.s__action-bar::after{content:"";display:table;clear:both}.s__action-bar{padding:0 15px}.s__action-bar .actions__list{width:100%;border-radius:.5em;overflow:hidden;text-align:center;background-color:#fff;float:left}.s__action-bar .actions__list li{display:block;float:left;margin-bottom:0;width:50%;border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.5);position:relative}.s__action-bar .actions__list li:after{content:" ";border-left:1px solid #fff;height:calc(100% - 34px);left:-.5px;top:20px;width:0;position:absolute;transition:all .2s ease}.s__action-bar .actions__list li:focus-within,.s__action-bar .actions__list li:hover{text-decoration:none}.s__action-bar .actions__list li:focus-within+li:after,.s__action-bar .actions__list li:focus-within:after,.s__action-bar .actions__list li:hover+li:after,.s__action-bar .actions__list li:hover:after{height:100%;top:0}a .s__action-bar .actions__list li:first-child:after{display:none}@media (min-width:576px){.s__action-bar .actions__list li{width:33.33333333%}}@media (min-width:768px){.s__action-bar .actions__list li{border:none;width:16.66666667%}}.s__action-bar .actions__list a{display:block;padding:20px 1em 14px;width:100%;font-family:museo-sans-rounded,sans-serif;font-weight:500;color:#fff;background-color:#2b7bb9;transition:all .2s ease}.s__action-bar .actions__list a:focus,.s__action-bar .actions__list a:hover{text-decoration:none;background-color:rgba(43,123,185,.8)}.s__action-bar .actions__list a div,.s__action-bar .actions__list a svg{display:block;width:44px;height:44px;background-size:44px 44px;background-position:center;margin:0 auto .5em}@media (min-width:768px){.s__action-bar .actions__list{margin-top:-40px}}@media (min-width:992px){.s__h{padding-bottom:0}}#homepage_action-bar{background-color:#f5f5f5}

seo.page_description: SSE supplies energy, phone and broadband to UK homes as well as boiler cover. See if you could save with our great value tariffs and home services products.
seo.meta_title: Energy Supplier, Phone & Broadband, Boiler Cover - SSE

content_module.content: From 1st April, all UK customers supplied by SSE Energy Supply Limited will be supplied by SSE Electricity Limited for electricity, and by SSE Retail Telecoms for phone and broadband. These are both part of the SSE Group.
content_module.sub_header: SSE is separating its Retail business

banner.content: Smart meters track your energy usage, send automatic meter readings and can help you use less energy in your home.

page_header.heading_1: A smarter way to help you save money
